game.name: President Yukino
game.shortDescription: President Yukino is a Slice of Life RPG brought to you in Native English and Chinese by Kagura Games and Acerola. Follow Yukino on her quest to go to the same graduate school as her boyfriend. Find out what mischief and shenanigans await her as she tries to power through part-time jobs and exams!
game.shortDescriptionEn: President Yukino is a Slice of Life RPG brought to you in Native English and Chinese by Kagura Games and Acerola. Follow Yukino on her quest to go to the same graduate school as her boyfriend. Find out what mischief and shenanigans await her as she tries to power through part-time jobs and exams!

reviewHighlights.text: [h1]A Massive Sandbox of Lewd Content Only Held Back by a Tedious Grind[/h1] President Yukino follows the classic Acerola template: a young couple in...
